title: Is there a dress code in pes main campus?
content: fresher here not sure when 1st semester starts either

comments.body: lmk when you get to know.
There isn't a strict dress code (for BTech). Just don't wear shorts to college.
If you're in BTech, there isn't a strict dress code. Just don't come to college in shorts.

All the Students should strictly refrain from wearing indecent clothing. Torn jeans, T -
shirts with indecent writing, and short and revealing clothes are not permitted
Don't wear anything torn, wear collar neck tshirts, shirts, jeans,denims etc. according to your comforts.
It's still fine but not recommended as per the management.
nothing is gonna happen, you can wear them. it was not allowed in pes ages back. its not an issue at all now
